functions.name: search_documents
functions.description: Search through the document database using semantic similarity and keyword matching. Use this to find relevant information from meeting minutes, agendas, ordinances, and other municipal documents.

query.description: The search query - can be a question, keywords, or specific terms to search for

user_id.description: User ID to filter results for

match_count.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 20)

match_threshold.description: Minimum similarity threshold for results (0.0-1.0, default 0.5)

functions.name: get_file_list
functions.description: Get a list of available files in the system, optionally filtered by user or file type

user_id.description: User ID to filter files for

limit.description: Maximum number of files to return (default 50)

functions.name: get_document_summary
functions.description: Get a summary or overview of a specific document by file ID

file_id.description: The ID of the file to get summary for
